record.field: # SERVER ACTION today = time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') session = env['pos.session'].search([('state','!=','closed')], limit=1) data = {'date_start': today, 'date_stop': today, 'session_id': session.id} action = env['ir.actions.report']._get_report_from_name('pos_daily_rma_report_no_wizard.template_pos_daily_rma').report_action([], data=data) action
